description: This file defines a ChatService class that handles sending chat messages via HTTP POST requests using the Dio package. It includes error handling and interacts with an API client and chat message model.

classes.name: ChatService
classes.description: Service class to facilitate sending chat messages through an API using Dio as HTTP client.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a chat message to the server and returns a ChatMessage object upon success.
